A4.text: Their parents, Mikael and Esther, return, and Dahlia, Esther’s sister, poses a serious danger to Hope.

A5.text: Dahlia, Esther’s sister, poses a serious danger to Hope, believing she is owed the first-born of every generation as they produce the most powerful witches.
